## MPStake class

Represents a user's MP stake and accrued gains.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class MPStake 
```

## Remarks

Returned by the [getMPStake()](./lib-base.readablemoneyp.getmpstake.md) function.

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `MPStake` class.

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [bpdGain](./lib-base.mpstake.bpdgain.md) |  | [Decimal](./lib-base.decimal.md) | BPD gain available to withdraw. |
|  [collateralGain](./lib-base.mpstake.collateralgain.md) |  | [Decimal](./lib-base.decimal.md) | Collateral gain available to withdraw. |
|  [isEmpty](./lib-base.mpstake.isempty.md) |  | boolean |  |
|  [stakedMP](./lib-base.mpstake.stakedmp.md) |  | [Decimal](./lib-base.decimal.md) | The amount of MP that's staked. |
